name: White Lady
description: This version of the White Lady is light and fresh, blending the subtle botanicals of gin with the sweetness of Cointreau and the tartness of lemon juice. Though the proportion of gin is high in Uyeda's iteration, his technique skillfully blends the flavors of the cocktail in such a way that it tastes as lovely and ethereal as it looks.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces dry gin, such as Martin Miller's or Beefeater

recipeInstructions.text: Add the gin, Cointreau and lemon juice to a shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.
